title: Thann Exfoliating Face Scrub for Women - Gentle Facial Exfoliator from Oatmeal & Apricot Seeds, Natural Microdermabrasion Scrub (100g)
features: GENTLY EXFOLIATES & DEEPLY MOISTURIZES - Up your face care routine with our Oatmeal Face Scrub. With oatmeal/oat kernel flour, this exfoliating scrub thoroughly cleanses while leaving the skin softer, smoother, and more supple.

ENRICHED WITH HYDRATING OILS - The oatmeal facial scrub has organic camellia seed oil and rice callus culture extract for a brighter skin, while marsh-mallow extracts containing vitamins A, B and C strengthens the skin condition. Rice bran oil is also rich in vitamin E and essential fatty acids.

SAFE SKIN CARE - Dermatologically tested, this men's and womens facial scrub is recommended for any skin type, whether dry, mature, young, and even sensitive. It also has no artificial colors and fragrance, and is mineral oil- and paraben-free.

EASY TO USE - Say goodbye to harsh exfoliating washcloths and complicated to use face scrubbers. Our oatmeal scrub is gentle and super easy to use. Wet your face and get an ample amount of the scrub. Apply on face, massage gently in circular motion, and leave on face for 5 minutes. Then, rinse thoroughly with water to reveal a softer and smoother skin.
description: Get glowing, radiant skin with our Oatmeal Face Scrub. This gentle facial scrub effectively removes dirt, dead skin cells, and other impurities that are deep-seated in the pores. With vitamin E-rich rice bran oil plus organic camellia oil and marsh-mallow extracts, the Oatmeal Face Scrub for men and women will restore your silky-smooth skin after every use.
